Package org.chudoba.michal.zapoctak.Game

Class GameHandling

java.lang.Object
org.chudoba.michal.zapoctak.Game.GameHandling
public class GameHandling extends Object
Class for game logistic. Shouldn't be used by itself, there should always be interface sitting on top of it. This interface should ensure, that players don't have direct communication with game logic. Provides all data it has if requested. The proper usage and providing the data so the players may not cheat, is left as a job for the interface.

    • tryHittingOpponent

      public boolean tryHittingOpponent(int i, int j, boolean playerTurnToken) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Complete one turn of game by hitting Field on opponent board specified by player.
      Parameters:
      i - y axis of Field location to hit
      j - x axis of Field location to hit
      playerTurnToken - token signaling from whom the command come
      Returns:
      return flag if ship was hit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If arguments don't pass the game state throw exception

    • isShipSunk

      public boolean isShipSunk(int i, int j, boolean playerTurnToken)
      Flag if the ship within the Field location on board sunk
      Parameters:
      i - y axis of specific Field location on board
      j - x axis of specific Field location on board
      playerTurnToken - player which just did the hit
      Returns:
      flag if the ship present at given Field has sunk
